title: Mine Own Executioner (restored, colorized) (1947, thriller, imdb score: 6.8)

sources.title: Mine Own Executioner (restored, colorized) (1947, thriller, imdb score: 6.8)
sources.description: Mine Own Executioner is a 1947 British psychological thriller drama film starring Burgess Meredith and directed by Anthony Kimmins , and based on the novel of the same name by Nigel Balchin . It was entered into the 1947 Cannes Film Festival . The title is derived from a quotation of John Donne 's " Devotions ", which serves as an epigraph for the original book.
